I originally really loved this song by Juice-Juice, "I can't go on! I used to really love this song by Juice-Juice,
I heard this song when I was a trainee member of the Halo Pro trainee unit and dreamed of making my debut,
There are times when you feel like you are going to give up,
I listened to this song and thought it was a song that made me feel like I could do my best at those times,
When you are lacking in confidence, you may feel like you are gaining confidence by rewarding yourself, for example, by putting on makeup,
You put on lipstick or something like that,
But I want to have real confidence,
I want to have the ability to perform, and I want to have the confidence that comes with making a debut,

Here's an announcement!
Hello Project 2023 Summer City Circuit has started!
Angelem will be performing at the Orix Theatre in Osaka on July 22nd.
Beyonce will be performing at the Orix Theater on the 23rd.
If you are in the area, please come and see us!
Please come and see us if you are in the area!
We will do our best so that you can see us improved from the spring tour.
And on August 13th, Angelem will be performing at the Rock in Japan Festival 2023!
This time, we will be the top performer on the Glass Stage.
This will be my second festival in the Rockies.This will be my second Rocky festival.
I hope to give a passionate performance.
Beyonce will be performing at Tokyo Idol Festival 2023 on August 4th and 5th.
On the 4th, we will be performing at the Amemurokawa Sea Seasonings Subway.
And on the 5th, we will be performing as Beyonce!
It's really rare to perform as a unit, so I'm really looking forward to it.
I'm looking forward to seeing you all, and I'm sure you'll be able to see many different Beyonc√© performances.
